definition: lit. bum beetle/sb who tags along/shadow/sycophant
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: He is just a flunky of the Party secretary.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是黨支部書記的跟屁蟲。

sentences.english: I hate it when Linda tries to imitate everything I do. She's such a copycat.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭琳達每件事都模仿我，她真是個跟屁蟲。

definition: to lose one's cool/to get impatient/unable to remain calm
crybaby
to boast
pinkeye/envy/jealousy
reckless/extremely daring
to make eyes/to wink
to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle
conjoined twins
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
boar
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
